      • pathCycleCovers

        public int[][] pathCycleCovers()
        Computes the cycle-path covers of the digraph by using the deletion-contraction recursion
        Returns:
        array with the number of cycle-path covers with i paths and j cycles

      • deletion

        public Digraph deletion(int u,
                        int v)
        Deletes an arc
        Parameters:
        u - origin of the arc to delete
        v - destination of the arc to delete
        Returns:
        a new Digraph resulting of the (u,v) deeletion

      • contraction

        public Digraph contraction(int u,
                           int v)
        Contracts an arc using the Chung-Graham method
        Parameters:
        u - origin of the arc to contract
        v - destination of the arc to contract
        Returns:
        a new Digraph resulting of the (u,v) contraction
